column1: Section:FIN-FHWA Billing, Transmit Bill to FHWA (3 Reqs)

column4: Electronically create and transmit billing file to FHWA containing all required data elements. Must pass FHWA certification  process.
Provide FHWA with a file providing all detail supporting the bill in format acceptable to FHWA.
Provide for automated receipting of federal cash and liquidating accounts receivable.
